value:
$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|I told you, run as you might, it is no
use so long as my brother's power
has been added to my own.$k$pThis nightmare is absolute.
There is no escape.$k$pSo, what will you do, hm? Which way
will you flee? Think. Think as hard as
you can!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what do we do, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Rrgh...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Surely you must understand by now!
Anything you do is useless.$k$pThere is no way out.$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|No. There's one way...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|...Brother?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Freyja... My sister... Perhaps my
words are no longer enough to
reach you...$k$pBut as your elder brother,
I accept my responsibility
to stop you...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face|Brother...$k$p$EFace_Pain|What is it you are planning to—
No. You mustn't!$k$p

$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Freyja's power is the sum of our
combined strengths...$k$pTherefore, one of us must
be shed...$k$pGentle mortals... I must entrust you
with the path to Freyja's defeat.$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Brother?! Nightmare, bind him!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Under Freyja's grip...I cannot
stop this... You must...hurry...$k$pThere is no time.
Do what you must.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Thank you...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother...$k$pBrother?!$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|As I die...your power is halved...$k$pNow, dreams and reality...will draw
apart...and these mortals can return
home...to their world...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother, no! If you die, I—$k$pAre they...truly so dear
to you as this?$k$p$WmMPID_フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Normal,Face|Nothing has ever been more
important...than you, Freyja.$k$pBut as long as I am with you,
the mortals will suffer...until
you finally destroy them.$k$pI could not bear to see you
become that...$k$pSo, for your sake...$k$pGoodbye...Sister...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Brother... NOOOOO!$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Dream-King...Freyr...$k$p$WmMEID_フレイヤ,ch00_27_Freya_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...UuuuaaaAAAGGGHHH!!$k$pNo... Not like this... This is not...
This is not what I wanted...$k$pI just...wanted you to smile at me
again, Brother... I just wanted
to feel loved again...$k$pAnd now... All my hopes...
all my...rrrraaaAAAGGGHHH!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Dream-King Freyr...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Lady Freyja and the dökkálfar
have vanished...$k$pAs Dream-King Freyr said, dreams
can no longer bend into reality. The
two realms should be separate now.$k$pWe should wake up and return
to the waking world.$k$pThat was...Freyr's wish.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Yes.$k$pAnd if we awaken, we can finally
reunite with $Nu.$k$p...I have to believe that.$k$p$Sbs150|
